text.section: To ensure that all areas of the State are served, the Department shall allocate at least annually among the counties the money appropriated for making Program loans under the Regular Rehabilitation Program.

The Department may:
allocate on a countywide basis first and then make suballocations among participating municipal corporations within counties;
allocate up to 25% of the total money available in the Special Loan Programs Fund to a reserve; and
from time to time, reallocate the money held in the reserve.
